name: Demon Tragedy
description:
oh no! oh SH#T!

the god damn demons attacks your alien town!

you have to weaken them

so that they can be torn apart later 

and who ate my sandwich?

this is clicker game made in scrach

made by 2 people

https://balterbhite.itch.io/   and   https://panmarchewagranie.itch.io

game is in development so you know...

oh and one more thing! if you get 1000 points you will get golden knife!
